Communication and Creative Essentials

The module provides students with essential practical experience in professional communication and creative production, while also enhancing their critical thinking and analytical skills. By the end of this module, students will have a strong foundation in communication, media production, and creative practices, preparing them for advanced communication courses at BUV.

Learning Objectives:

+  Interpret and respond to industrial briefs, considering aesthetic, creative practice, business strategy, and client expectations.

+  Manage media creation in a group project and evaluate the effectiveness of design concepts in varying contexts.

+  Reflect on practice and express ideas confidently through audio- visual, verbal, and written communication.

+  Gain an overview of business, design, and strategy in the creative industries.
